name: Battle Of Keys
description: Low Poly FPS Shooter where you need find 5 keys and avoid police army
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 8 Processor: i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GeForce 800 series DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Direct x9
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 Processor: i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 900 series DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Direct x9
